Name: rd_me
definition: Research and Development Expense scaled by market equity (i.e. Share Price times publicly held number of shares)

Name: market_equity
definition: Stock share price times publicly held number of shares

Name: dolvol_126d
definition: Dollar Volume in other words Trading volume (total number of shares of a stock sold during a period) mutiplied by stock share price over the previous 6 months

Name: ami_126d
definition: current Amihud Measure is  a measure of illiquidity, which is the daily ratio of absolute stock return to its dollar volume. (i.e. Trading volume (total number of shares of a stock sold during a period) mutiplied by stock share price)
